com.aylanetworks.agilelink

类 IDPAuthManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.agilelink.IDPAuthManager

  • public class IDPAuthManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handle all IDP auth stuffs, including following steps:
  • 1. Read config file from assets directory, named `IDPPartners.json`
  • 2. Get partner tokens for sign in to partner cloud.
  • 3. Sign in partner cloud.

    • Once auth completed, you can get AylaPartnerAuthorization object by calling getPartnerAuthorization(String).
    To monitor auth status, add IDPAuthManager.IDPAuthListener.

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  IDPAuthManager.IDPAuthListener
      IDP Auth status listener
